Hi Bill,
Â 
We're excited to let you know about a new feature now available on your content calendar - Post Shuffling!


You can now easily shuffle your scheduled posts with flexible options to fit your needs:
 * Shuffle by Accounts - Select one or more accounts and shuffle only the posts associated with them. This is perfect for mixing
   up content on specific platforms without affecting your entire schedule.

 * Shuffle by Date Range - Choose a custom date range and shuffle all scheduled posts within that window. Great for refreshing a
   particular week, month, or campaign period.


How It Works

 1. Navigate to your Calendar view.

 1. Click the Shuffle Posts button.

 1. Choose your shuffle criteria:

 * Select the account(s) you'd like to shuffle.

 * Define the date range you want to apply the shuffle to.

 1. Confirm, and your posts will be randomly reordered within your selected parameters.

> Note: Shuffling only rearranges the order of your existing scheduled posts - no content will be deleted or modified.

Â 
This is a great way to keep your content feeling fresh and avoid predictable posting patterns for your audience.
Â

Â 
Talk soon!
PostSyncer Team
Â 
Any questions? Hit our FAQ [https://postsyncer.com/#faq] or reply to this email

SKIP all Google Security Alert emails. SKIP all GitHub notification emails about PR comments, reviews, code review requests, CI/CD status, and issue comments.
